tracks.text: Stylistic note, this is animated. Helicopters fly over an endless expanse of run down buildings, hazy with smog
A tower stands overs the city, rising high above the clouds. High up in the tower, there's a window with a sign sayingk "Feel Good Inc."
Through the window is club, lit with red lights. The floor is a sea of mostly naked bodies. People smoke.
A figure sits on a stage in an office chair. It's vocalist 2-D, a blue haired monkey with red eyes and jagged teeth
Elsewhere in the club, bassist Murdoc Niccals strums an instrument. He's a shirtless monkey with short black hair. 2 naked women like next to him, playing with his nipples.
Drummer Russell Hobbs plays drums in front of red curtains. He's a large gorilla in a red jacket, with a white baseball cap reading 'Encore'
2-D stands up, holding a megaphone. He looks out at the people, including Niccals, on the floor. He sings into the megaphone.
Either dust or smoke comes out of the megaphone.
2-D walks towards the window. As he passes, Niccals rises from the floor.
Niccals stands and plays bass, while several naked women look up at him, bathed in red light.
On a sunny day, a windmill floats up through the clouds. It bobs gently, as if it were a ship.
2-D watches the windmill through the window.
The windmill splits the clouds as if they were waves.
The sun sets behind the clouds. Helicopters follow the windmill, mixed in a yellow haze.
Back in the club, the curtains have been pulled back. On a TV screen, a non-animated person addresses the crowd. It's rapper De La Sol.
2-D vibrates, and glitches towards the the stage and screen. He's surrounded by screens showing De La Soul
Niccals appears on a screen, playing bass. 3 men are now on screen, surrounding 2-D.
2-D looks anxious, but the clear sky appears in the window behind him. Hobbs plays drums.
2-D turns to look out the window. A swarm of helicopters buzz around in the dying light.
On a bright, sunny day, a flying island emerges from a cloud. The island is home to the windmill. A blue haired female monkey sits on the edge of the island. It's guitarist Noodle.
It flies towards the tower, which is cast in darkness.
2-D watches the windmill through the window. He turns away. From inside the club, all we can see are the buzzing flies/helicopters.
Hobbs plays drums on a stage between tall speakers. Behind him, a live action human sings to us.
Noodle plays guitar, riding on the edge of the windmill island. 2-D watches Noodle go by, hands pressed to the window.
Butterflies fly around Noodle, replacing 2-D's helicopters.
2-D's hands fall from the window, leaving gloomy streaks. The red light disappears into darkness.
Niccals plays on a stage, dwarfed by the live action singer on the screen behind him.
The flying windmill island drifts into the sky.
The live action singers laugh at us. Niccals plays bass in the club while crotch thrusting. 2-D slowly lowers himself back into his office chair.
2-D looks down, and we zoom out. The floor is a sea of mostly naked bodies, lit with red lights.
Helicopters follow the floating island, which becomes obscured by dark clouds. Fade to black.
